content.rendered:
Directed by Christopher Papakaliatis. Akis Polizos.

Written by Christopher Papakaliatis.

Cast Klelia Andriolatou (Klelia). Maria Kavoyianni (Maria). Fanis Mouratidis (Fanis). Marisha Triantafyllidou (Sofia). Giannis Tsortekis (Haralambos). Orestis Chalkias (Antonis). Yorgos Benos (Spyros). Spyro Curtis (British Friend Musician). Haris Alexiou (Haris). Antinoos Albanis (Michalis). Dimitris Kitsos (Thanos). Stefania Goulioti (Alexandra). Tonia Maraki (Gianna). Sandra Sarafanova (Lena). Ioanna Chronopoulou (Kiki). Giorgos Biniaris (Dionysis). Christos Loulis (Andreas). Mantalena Papadatou (Dionysis’ wife). Alexandros Mylonas (Alexandra’s Father). Elias Argentiere (Giovanni). Meletis Georgiadis (Doctor). Dimitris Kalimeris (Policeman). Litsa Giannou (Lena’s mother). Margarita Alexiadi (Young Haris) .Giorgos Roufas . Christos Stilianou (Young Dionysis). Andreas Karvounis (Young Spyros). Nikolais Bibli (Irene). Dimitris Apostolidis (Priest). Alkistis Poulopoulou (Zoe). Konstantinos Sfigas (Policeman). Manfredi Saavedra (Giovanni). Pavlina Zahra (Fanis’ secretary). Kora Karvouni(unknow)

Language Greek.

Producers Stelios Cotionis. Giorgos Moshovitis.

Production Foss Productions.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status On Going (2022–)
